Static Site Boilerplate

Introduction

A repository I can git-clone when starting new projects.

Pretty similar to Yeoman, but pared down according to personal preferences.

Powered heavily by grunt, which has revolutionized my front-end workflow.

Supported Features

  • Modernizr.js for feature detection
  • jQuery (local on dev, Google CDN on production)
  • Coffeescript compilation
  • SASS/Compass compilation
  • Production: Minfication/concatenation of CSS/JS
  • Production: Image optimization

Grunt Packages

  • grunt: "~0.4.1"
  • grunt-contrib-uglify: "~0.2.2"
  • grunt-contrib-cssmin: "~0.6.1"
  • grunt-contrib-compass: "~0.4.1"
  • grunt-contrib-watch: "~0.5.1"
  • grunt-notify: "~0.2.7"
  • grunt-contrib-coffee: "~0.7.0
